name: A Dude With A Hammer
description:
Are you being refused to pay for your honest work? This game is a quick guide to what you need to do in this situation.

Having come for a payment, you were deceived.

"Roses are Red, Violets are Blue and we won`t pay you."

Now you only have one way out. Take a hammer, stock up on explosives and go forward, bring destruction to your former employer.
